name: webdriverio-typescript-boilerplate
description: This project will show you how to start your UI Automation Test with WebdriverIO and TypeScript

scripts.test: rimraf reports/* && npm run report:history && npm run prettier && wdio
scripts.test:dev: rimraf reports/* && npm run report:history && npm run prettier && wdio --dev
scripts.report:history: if not exist allure-report\history mkdir allure-report\history && if not exist allure-results\history mkdir allure-results\history && xcopy /s/i/Y allure-report\history allure-results\history
scripts.report: npm run clean-report && npm run test ; npm run run-report
